data.title: PRIMAKARA UNIVERSITY
data.content: Leveraging my vocational school experiences and achievements, I was awarded a scholarship to attend my desired university. Here, I have significantly expanded my programming knowledge.

data.title: SMKN 1 DENPASAR
data.content: This was my first exposure to programming. I gained basic knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. I once developed a website for selecting the OSIS chairman of SMKN 1 Denpasar
